attributes.action: Keep driving lessons and tests going through 2nd lockdown.
attributes.additional_details: There was an awful backlog and not having a driving license has made it hard to get certain jobs and been a real inconvenience. I believe driving lessons should continue with masks and sanitised vehicles and temperature checks before the tests and lessons in order to prevent another chaotic backlog.
attributes.background: Allow driving lessons and tests to continue during the November lockdown

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
